Peter Rice , the head of entertainment on the Fox network, said: If Cheryl Cole was to be on the show, I think she's proved she's a terrific judge. She has wonderful chemistry with Simon Cowell . Am I concerned that this thing is taking longer than I thought? Absolutely yes, Sergio Marchionne said. "There are a couple of projects that need funding, but so far we're fine." An Energy Department spokesman declined to comment on Chrysler's loan application.

"I made a comment like "Thank you' or something, and President Bush looked me in the eye and said,` You better take this seriously," the former Pentagon chief recalled. And of course, I did take it seriously. But I was also realistic that there was not much one could do about that. The television appearance was part of Donald Rumsfeld "s effort to promote his new memoir, "Known and Unkown," which was recounts his long government career serving Republican presidents from Richard Nixon to President Bush .

in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
